select comments_seq.nextval from dual
insert into comments( comments_id, comments_board, comments_member, comments_content ) values ( #{comments_id}, #{comments_board}, #{comments_member}, #{comments_content} )
mapper.select: select c.comments_id, b.board_id, c.comments_member, c.comments_content, c.comments_create_time, c.comments_edit_time from comments c left outer join board b on (c.comments_board = b.board_id) where b.board_id = #{board_id} order by comments_create_time desc
